sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-form class="px-4 mt-3">
        <v-dialog
            ref="dialogInicial"
            v-model="modal1"
            :return-value.sync="timeInicial"
            persistent
            width="290px"
        >
            <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
            <v-text-field
                v-model="timeInicial"
                label="Horário Inicio Reservas"
                prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
                readonly
                v-bind="attrs"
                v-on="on"
                :rules="requiredRules"
                color="green"
            ></v-text-field>
            </template>
            <v-time-picker
                v-if="modal1"
                v-model="timeInicial"
                full-width
                format="24hr"
                required
                color="green"
            >
            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            <v-btn
                text
                @click="modal1 = false"
            >
                Cancelar
            </v-btn>
            <v-btn
                text
                color="green"
                @click="$refs.dialogInicial.save(timeInicial)"
            >
                OK
            </v-btn>
            </v-time-picker>
        </v-dialog>
        <v-dialog
            ref="dialogFinal"
            v-model="modal2"
            :return-value.sync="timeFinal"
            persistent
            width="290px"
        >
            <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
            <v-text-field
                v-model="timeFinal"
                label="Horário Fim Reservas"
                prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
                readonly
                v-bind="attrs"
                v-on="on"
                :rules="requiredRules"
                color="green"
            ></v-text-field>
            </template>
            <v-time-picker
                v-if="modal2"
                v-model="timeFinal"
                full-width
                format="24hr"
                required
                color="green"
            >
            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            <v-btn
                text
                @click="modal2 = false"
            >
                Cancelar
            </v-btn>
            <v-btn
                text
                color="green"
                @click="$refs.dialogFinal.save(timeFinal)"
            >
                OK
            </v-btn>
            </v-time-picker>
        </v-dialog>
        <v-select
            v-model="reservaPorPeriodo"
            :items="items"
            label="Reserva por Periodo"
            prepend-icon="mdi-party-popper"
            color="green"
        ></v-select>
        <v-select
            v-model="reservaPorMesa"
            :items="items"
            label="Reserva por mesas"
            prepend-icon="mdi-party-popper"
            color="green"
        ></v-select>
        <v-text-field
            v-model="quantidadeMesas"
            prepend-icon="mdi-account-plus"
            label="Quantidade Mesas"
            required
            type="number"
            pattern="\d*"
            :rules="requiredPeopleRules"
            color="green"
            :disabled="reservaPorMesa == 'Não'"
        />
        <v-select
            v-model="reservaPorPessoas"
            :items="items"
            label="Reserva por Pessoas"
            prepend-icon="mdi-party-popper"
            color="green"
        ></v-select>
        <v-text-field
            v-model="quantidadePessoas"
            prepend-icon="mdi-account-plus"
            label="Quantidade Pessoas"
            required
            type="number"
            pattern="\d*"
            :rules="requiredPeopleRules"
            color="green"
            :disabled="reservaPorPessoas == 'Não'"
        />
        <v-row class="px-3 py-7">
            <v-btn
                outlined
                large
                block
                color="green"
                @click="Salvar()"
                >
                Confirmar
            </v-btn>
        </v-row>
        <load-component :Ativo="loader"/>
    </v-form>
</template>
<script>

import api from '@/services/api';
import LoadComponent from '../LoadComponent.vue';

export default {
    components: { LoadComponent },

    name: 'CadastroConfiguracoesEmpresaComponent',

    data: () => ({
        loader: false,
        modal1: false,
        modal2: false,
        items: ['Sim', 'Não'],
        requiredPeopleRules: [
            v => v != null && v != 0 || 'Campo Obrigatório.'
        ],
        requiredRules: [
            v => v != null || 'Campo Obrigatório.',
        ],
    }),

    methods: {
        Salvar(){
            this.loader = !this.loader;

            api.put('ConfiguracoesEmpresa', {
                Id: this.configuracoesEmpresaId,
                HorarioInicio: this.timeInicial,
                HorarioFim: this.timeFinal,
                EhPorMesas: this.reservaPorMesa,
                QuantidadeMesas: this.quantidadeMesas,
                EhPorPessoas: this.reservaPorPessoas,
                QuantidadePessoas: this.quantidadePessoas,
                TempoReservaMinutos: 0
            })
            .then(response => {
                this.$emit('response', { success: true, response: response })
            })
            .catch(error => {
                this.$emit('response', { success: false, response: error })
            })
            .finally(() => (this.loader = !this.loader))
        }
    },

    props: {
        configuracoesEmpresaId: String,
        timeInicial: String,
        timeFinal: String,
        reservaPorPeriodo: String,
        reservaPorMesa: String,
        quantidadeMesas: Number,
        reservaPorPessoas: String,
        quantidadePessoas: Number,
    }
}
</script>
<style>
    
</style>
